body_html:
Thanks for the export NCCL_DEBUG=INFO tip, @ngimel!

CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING isn't set. The debug output looks relatively fine, though I don't know what it means:

In point number 2 (running with nccl 1.3.5):
https://gist.github.com/zou3519/710386c8f021ec8f12e1c71201d064d6

In point number 3 (running with nccl 2.0.5):
https://gist.github.com/zou3519/0534fc3de73ef501599182053a6b2f6d

Thanks for the export NCCL_DEBUG=INFO tip, @ngimel! 

CUDA_LAUNCH_BLOCKING isn't set. The debug output looks relatively fine, though I don't know what it means:
